Calculation
===========

This collection of steps is very broad in scope, but all perform some kind of computation on the compounds passed to them

.. currentmodule:: icolos.core.workflow_steps.calculation

   base.StepCalculationBase
   boltzmann_weighting.StepBoltzmannWeighting

   esp_sim.StepEspSim

   kallisto.StepKallisto
   lomap.StepLomap
